revised_title: A Taxonomic Study of Ipecacuanha Roots
tldr: The author provides a detailed description and classification of different types of Ipecacuanha roots, including their physical characteristics, growth locations, and medicinal uses. They distinguish between true and false Ipecacuanha, and classify the roots into four main types: black, brown, grey, and white. The author also discusses the origins and uses of these roots in various parts of the world.
